step_by_step_thinking: The patient received zidovudine during delivery, indicating HIV testing was initiated. Rapid screening tests may have been used initially, but confirmatory testing is required. Confirmatory HIV tests typically involve antibody differentiation assays to distinguish HIV-1 and HIV-2. Southern blot (DNA) and Northern blot (RNA) are not standard confirmatory tests for HIV. The correct confirmatory test is an HIV-1/HIV-2 antibody differentiation immunoassay.
